externalguidance-machine-translation-hea: Header label shown below the title for a page in a machine translation context
externalguidance-machine-translation-con: Label for contribute action for a page in a machine translation context
externalguidance-specialpage-mt-intro: A brief explanation on why you cannot edit on a machine translated page
externalguidance-specialpage-mt-pageexis: There is a version of this page manually started by editors in $1 that you can help expand.
externalguidance-specialpage-intro-machi: A short note on why machine translation can be bad.
externalguidance-specialpage-intro-human: A short note on why human translations are better.
externalguidance-specialpage-contribute-: Title for section that lists the ways to contribute.
A short note saying the article can be created.
Button label to create a new article.
A short note saying the user can expand the existing article.
Button label to expand the existing article.
A short note to indicate the source article can also be improved.
Button label for improving source article.
externalguidance-machine-translation-pag: Message shown when the page exist in target language. $1 is target language title
Message shown when the page is missing in target language. $1 - Target language autonym
